description.zh-cn: 一所坐落于英国伦敦的公立研究型大学，为英格兰第三古老的高等教育机构。以其不拘学生性别及宗教背景的世俗高校理念而创立。
description.en: A public research university located in London, England. It is the third-oldest higher education institution in England, founded on secular principles, admitting students regardless of gender or religion.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰诗人，伦敦大学学院的创办人之一。
description.en: Scottish poet and a co-founder of University College London.

nodes.id: 第一代布鲁厄姆和沃克斯男爵亨利·布鲁厄姆

zh-cn: 第一代布鲁厄姆和沃克斯男爵亨利·布鲁厄姆
en: Henry Brougham, 1st Baron Brougham and Vaux

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰律师，伦敦大学学院的创办人之一。
description.en: Scottish lawyer and a co-founder of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 英国哲学家，其教育理念深刻影响了伦敦大学学院的创办者，被誉为“伦大教父”。
description.en: English philosopher whose educational ideas deeply influenced the founders of University College London, earning him the title of its 'spiritual father'.

description.zh-cn: 德国的一所大学，其宗教自由的办学理念启发了伦敦大学学院的创立。
description.en: A university in Germany whose principle of religious freedom inspired the founding of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的联邦制大学，伦敦大学学院是其始创成员学院之一。
description.en: A federal university in London, England, of which University College London is a founding constituent college.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的研究型大学，与伦敦大学学院同为伦敦大学的始创成员学院，两校间存在历史悠久的竞争关系。
description.en: A research university in London, England. It is a founding constituent college of the University of London along with UCL, and has a long-standing rivalry with it.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利外交官，曾对伦敦大学学院的建立表示反对。
description.en: Austrian diplomat who expressed opposition to the establishment of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 英国政党。由其领导的政府在1831年为伦敦大学学院争取到皇家宪章。
description.en: A British political party. The government led by it successfully secured a Royal Charter for University College London in 1831.

description.zh-cn: 设计伦敦大学学院本部大楼的建筑师。
description.en: The architect who designed the main building of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 前英国女王，于1985年主持了伦敦大学学院本部大楼的启用仪式。
description.en: Former Queen of the United Kingdom, who presided over the opening ceremony of the main building of University College London in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，伦敦大学学院的建筑被炸毁，多数院系搬离伦敦。
description.en: During the Second World War, buildings of University College London were bombed, and most departments were evacuated from London.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的公立研究型大学，与伦敦大学学院有多次合作，并曾有合并草议。
description.en: A public research university in London, England, which has collaborated with University College London on several occasions and once had a merger proposal.

description.zh-cn: 耶鲁大学的医学院，与伦敦大学学院签订了两校史上最具规模的合作项目。
description.en: The medical school of Yale University, which has signed the largest collaborative project in the history of both universities with University College London.

description.zh-cn: 由伦敦大学学院与伦敦帝国学院合资创办的研究中心。
description.en: A research centre established as a joint venture between University College London and Imperial College London.

description.zh-cn: 由爱思唯尔出版社与伦敦大学学院合作开办的研究中心。
description.en: A research centre established in collaboration between Elsevier and University College London.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于荷兰阿姆斯特丹的全球性信息分析公司，与伦敦大学学院合作开办了大数据研究中心。
description.en: A global information analytics business headquartered in Amsterdam, which co-founded the Big Data Institute with University College London.

description.zh-cn: 英国的国家级数据科学与人工智能研究院，伦敦大学学院是其五所始创大学成员之一。
description.en: The national institute for data science and artificial intelligence in the United Kingdom, of which University College London is one of the five founding university members.

description.zh-cn: 印度独立运动领袖，伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: Leader of the Indian independence movement and an alumnus of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 前日本首相，伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Japan and an alumnus of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 前日本首相，伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Japan and an alumnus of University College London.

nodes.id: 亚历山大·格拉汉姆·贝尔

zh-cn: 亚历山大·格拉汉姆·贝尔

description.zh-cn: 首个电话专利持有者，伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: Holder of the first patent for the telephone and an alumnus of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 去氧核糖核酸发现者及诺贝尔生理学或医学奖得主之一，伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: Co-discoverer of the structure of the DNA molecule and Nobel laureate in Physiology or Medicine, and an alumnus of University College London.

description.zh-cn: “光纤之父”及诺贝尔物理学奖得主，伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: 'Father of Fiber Optics' and Nobel laureate in Physics, and an alumnus of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 英国摇滚乐队，所有成员均为伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: British rock band, all members of which are alumni of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 电影导演，伦敦大学学院校友。
description.en: Film director and an alumnus of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 英国皇室成员，担任伦敦大学学院校监。
description.en: Member of the British royal family, serving as the Chancellor of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院教务长。
description.en: Provost of University College London.

nodes.id: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

zh-cn: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

description.zh-cn: 位于伦敦的生物医学研究中心，由伦敦大学学院、伦敦国王学院、伦敦帝国学院等机构共同成立。
description.en: A biomedical research centre in London, co-founded by institutions including University College London, King's College London, and Imperial College London.

description.zh-cn: 英国国家级医学研究资助机构，弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: A national funding agency for medical research in the UK, and a co-founder of the Francis Crick Institute.

description.zh-cn: 英国的癌症研究和宣传慈善机构，弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: A cancer research and awareness charity in the UK, and a co-founder of the Francis Crick Institute.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于伦敦的生物医学研究慈善基金会，弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: A London-based charitable foundation focused on biomedical research, and a co-founder of the Francis Crick Institute.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚南澳大利亚州的首府，伦敦大学学院在此设有能源学院。
description.en: The capital city of South Australia, Australia, where UCL has a campus for its School of Energy and Resources.

description.zh-cn: 卡塔尔的首都，伦敦大学学院在此设有考古与博物馆学院。
description.en: The capital city of Qatar, where UCL has a campus for archaeology and museum studies.

description.zh-cn: 汤玛斯·坎贝尔与亨利·布鲁厄姆共同创办了伦敦大学学院。
description.en: Thomas Campbell co-founded University College London with Henry Brougham.

relationships.source: 第一代布鲁厄姆和沃克斯男爵亨利·布鲁厄姆

description.zh-cn: 亨利·布鲁厄姆与汤玛斯·坎贝尔共同创办了伦敦大学学院。
description.en: Henry Brougham co-founded University College London with Thomas Campbell.

description.zh-cn: 杰里米·边沁关于普及教育的思想深刻影响了伦敦大学学院的创办者，成为学校的办学理念，因此他被誉为“伦大教父”。
description.en: Jeremy Bentham's ideas on universal education deeply influenced the founders of University College London, becoming the institution's guiding philosophy, which earned him the title of its 'spiritual father'.

description.zh-cn: 创办人之一汤玛斯·坎贝尔在到访波恩大学后，受其宗教自由的办学理念启发，决定在伦敦建立类似的学府，即伦敦大学学院。
description.en: After visiting the University of Bonn, co-founder Thomas Campbell was inspired by its principle of religious freedom and decided to establish a similar institution in London, which became University College London.

description.zh-cn: 1836年，伦敦大学学院与伦敦国王学院成为新成立的伦敦大学的两位始创成员学院。
description.en: In 1836, University College London and King's College London became the two founding constituent colleges of the newly established University of London.

description.zh-cn: 1836年，伦敦国王学院与伦敦大学学院成为新成立的伦敦大学的两位始创成员学院。
description.en: In 1836, King's College London and University College London became the two founding constituent colleges of the newly established University of London.

description.zh-cn: 两校之间存在历史悠久的体育竞争关系。
description.en: The two colleges have a long-standing rivalry in sports.

description.zh-cn: 在伦敦大学学院筹建期间，奥地利外交官克莱门斯·梅特涅曾要求他的驻英大使转述他对此计划“可能有损英格兰发展”的反对看法。
description.en: During the planning stages of University College London, Austrian diplomat Klemens von Metternich instructed his ambassador to the UK to convey his opposition, viewing the project as potentially 'detrimental to England's development'.

description.zh-cn: 由辉格党领导的英国政府在1831年成功为伦敦大学学院争取到皇家宪章，赋予其颁授学位的权力。
description.en: In 1831, the Whig-led British government successfully secured a Royal Charter for University College London, granting it the power to award degrees.

description.zh-cn: 威廉·威尔金斯作为建筑师设计了伦敦大学学院的本部大楼。
description.en: William Wilkins, as the architect, designed the main building of University College London.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，女王伊利沙伯二世主持了伦敦大学学院本部大楼的启用仪式，标志其最终完工。
description.en: In 1985, Queen Elizabeth II presided over the opening ceremony of the main building of University College London, marking its final completion.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，伦敦大学学院的本部大楼被炸毁，多数院系被迫搬离伦敦。
description.en: During World War II, the main building of University College London was bombed, and most of its departments were forced to evacuate London.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院与耶鲁医学院签订了两校史上最具规模的合作项目，研究范围从生物医学延伸至人文与社会科学。
description.en: University College London and Yale School of Medicine signed the largest collaborative project in their histories, with research spanning from biomedicine to the humanities and social sciences.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院与伦敦帝国学院合资创办了伦敦纳米技术中心。
description.en: University College London and Imperial College London jointly founded the London Centre of Nanotechnology.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦帝国学院与伦敦大学学院合资创办了伦敦纳米技术中心。
description.en: Imperial College London and University College London jointly founded the London Centre of Nanotechnology.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院与爱思唯尔出版社合作开办了大数据研究中心。
description.en: University College London co-founded the Big Data Institute in partnership with Elsevier.

description.zh-cn: 爱思唯尔出版社与伦敦大学学院合作开办了大数据研究中心。
description.en: Elsevier co-founded the Big Data Institute in partnership with University College London.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院是艾伦图灵研究院的五所始创大学成员之一。
description.en: University College London is one of the five founding university members of the Alan Turing Institute.

relationships.source: 亚历山大·格拉汉姆·贝尔

description.zh-cn: 酷玩乐团的所有成员均为伦敦大学学院的校友。
description.en: All members of the band Coldplay are alumni of University College London.

relationships.target: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院是弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: University College London is one of the co-founders of the Francis Crick Institute.

relationships.target: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

description.zh-cn: 伦敦国王学院是弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: King's College London is one of the co-founders of the Francis Crick Institute.

relationships.target: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

description.zh-cn: 伦敦帝国学院是弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: Imperial College London is one of the co-founders of the Francis Crick Institute.

relationships.target: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

description.zh-cn: 英国医学研究协会是弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: The Medical Research Council is one of the co-founders of the Francis Crick Institute.

relationships.target: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

description.zh-cn: 英国癌症研究慈善会是弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: Cancer Research UK is one of the co-founders of the Francis Crick Institute.

relationships.target: 弗朗西斯·克里克研究院

description.zh-cn: 惠康基金会是弗朗西斯·克里克研究院的共同创办者之一。
description.en: The Wellcome Trust is one of the co-founders of the Francis Crick Institute.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院在澳大利亚阿德雷德设立了能源学院卫星校园。
description.en: University College London established a satellite campus for its School of Energy and Resources in Adelaide, Australia.

description.zh-cn: 伦敦大学学院在卡塔尔多哈设立了考古与博物馆学院卫星校园。
description.en: University College London established a satellite campus for archaeology and museum studies in Doha, Qatar.
